text: Terrifier 2 is a 2023 American supernatural slasher movie written, directed, edited and produced by Damien Leone. It is a sequel to Terrifier (2016). It is the second movie about Art the Clown. It is the second movie in the Terrifier franchise. It stars David Howard Thornton as Art the Clown and Samantha Scaffidi as Victoria Heyes. It also stars Lauren LaVera as Sienna Shaw. It was released on February 24, 2023 to positive reviews. Some audience members were said to have vomited and faint because of some gory and violent scenes in the movie. A sequel, Terrifier 3, will be released in 2024. ==References== Category:2022 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:Movies directed by Damien Leone
title: Terrifier 2
